TopicTitle: ksp crashes randomly in all game scenes

Articles.Content:
Hello.

For the past week or so, KSP has been crashing randomly only a few minutes after it is started. It has been very frustrating because it happened for no obvious reason- Not when i loaded a large part craft or when my space station came within physics range. it also happened in all game scenes.

i'm using the most recent version of ksp, though the issue happened in an RSS save, 1.5.1 unmodded and 1.10.1 unmodded.

when it crashes, it shows the unity crash handler, if that is any help to diagnose the problem

i've tried uninstalling all other versions of ksp on my pc and i uninstalled all mods.

any and all help is appreciated, thanks!

Updated crash log: https://file.io/3HciwvfuEDir

Edited August 20, 2020 by Earthsam12
The link is 404ing.  Please correct it so the file is findable.
Make sure to post the KSP.log so we can see all the events before the crash
